title:
Best constant and extremal functions for a class Hardy-Sobolev-Maz'ya
  inequalities
abstract:
We derive an integral identity for a class $p$-Laplace equation, and then
classify all positive finite energy cylindrically symmetric solutions of the
equation (\ref{1.2}) for $3\leq k\leq n-1,$ with the help of some a prior
estimates. Combining this with the result of Secchi-Smets-Willem{\cite{SSW03}},
as a consequence, we obtain the best constant and extremal functions for the
related Hardy-Sobolev-Maz'ya inequalities.
